title: Self Registration Form
description: Complete this form to self-register and receive a Unique Identification Number (UIN).
name: Full Name
details: The data collected above will be used only to create credential(s) for you, that will further facilitate your use of MOSIP. By ticking the box below, you consent to submitting your data to be stored and processed for the above purpose.
uin_message: Your Unique Identification Number (UIN) has been successfully issued.
further_details: Please check your email for further details.
err_fn_num: Full Name should not contain numbers
err_mn_n: Mobile Number should contain only numbers
err_mn_digits: Mobile Number must be between 8 to 15 digits
err_dob_ftr: Date of Birth cannot be greater than today
SELF_ERR-003: Something went wrong. Please try again!
